Name: Relaxing Kite
About the game: Are we going to fly a kite? Sure! But without leaving home. Take on the role of a character who tries to keep the kite in the air as long as possible. Watch out for obstacles that will make this task difficult for you. If you stay in the air longer, you will unlock exciting new maps, original characters, and above all, wonderful-looking kites. It is not the end! The game has a very advanced system of adjusting the difficulty level to the user. This allows you to enjoy the game even more. It won't be too hard or too easy. Relaxing Kite is a game designed for all people who dream of a moment of peace and relaxation. The game is characterized by an extremely pleasant control mechanism, smooth animations, and brilliant graphics and sound
